cleaned_text: Essential Oils Long thought of as just aromatherapy, essential oils have many beneficial health uses. You not only can use it aromatically to it's calming affects, you can use it topically, and some you can use internally as in tea or cooking. Let us guide you to which oils can enhance your treatment and/or advice which oils to purchase as an easy way to incorporate into your own wellness routine. Brief consultations can be included into your follow up treatment or a more thorough consultation for $50. Part of which can go towards a doterra membership or purchase of essential oils.
